node.dox:d:
@mainpage
An interface to the history service

interface.name: com.canonical.HistoryService
interface.dox:d: An interface to the history service

method.name: ThreadForParticipants
method.dox:d: Return an existing thread for the given parameters.

signal.name: ThreadsAdded
signal.dox:d: Threads were added to the storage. The argument is a list of threads. Each thread is represented by a QVariantMap of its properties.

signal.name: ThreadsModified
signal.dox:d: Threads were modified in the storage. The argument is a list of threads. Each thread is represented by a QVariantMap of its properties.

signal.name: ThreadsRemoved
signal.dox:d: Threads were removed from the storage. The argument is a list of threads. Each thread is represented by a QVariantMap of its properties.

signal.name: EventsAdded
signal.dox:d: Events were added to the storage. The argument is a list of events. Each event is represented by a QVariantMap of its properties.

signal.name: EventsModified
signal.dox:d: Events were modified in the storage. The argument is a list of events. Each event is represented by a QVariantMap of its properties.

signal.name: EventsRemoved
signal.dox:d: Events were removed from the storage. The argument is a list of events. Each event is represented by a QVariantMap of its properties.
